params.date: The date for which votes are being queried.
params.showId: The unique identifier of the show.

returns._0: The number of votes for the specified date.

params.showId: The unique identifier of the show.

returns._0: True if the user has voted for a date, false otherwise.

params.showId: The unique identifier of the venue.

returns._0: True if the ticket owner has voted, false otherwise.

params.showId: The unique identifier of the venue.

returns._0: True if the user has voted, false otherwise.

params.showId: The unique identifier of the show.

returns._0: The previous date vote of the user.

params.showId: The unique identifier of the venue.

returns._0: The previous vote of the user.

getProposal(bytes32,uint256).details: This function returns the proposal stored at the given index in the showProposals mapping.

params.proposalIndex: The index of the proposal in the proposal list for the specified show.
params.showId: The unique identifier of the show.

returns._0: Proposal The proposal at the specified index for the given show.

params.showId: The unique identifier of the venue.

returns._0: The proposal period of the venue.

getProposalsCount(bytes32).details: This function counts and returns the number of entries in the proposal array for the specified show ID.

params.showId: The unique identifier of the show.

returns._0: uint256 The total number of proposals stored for the given show.
The amount of refund owed to the proposer.

params.showId: The unique identifier of the show.

returns._0: The selected date for the show.

params.showId: The unique identifier of the show.

returns._0: The index of the selected proposal for the show.

params.showId: The unique identifier of the venue.

returns._0: An array of proposals for the venue.

params.showId: The unique identifier of the venue.

returns._0: The voting period of the venue.

params._proposalDateExtension: Duration in seconds by which the proposal date is extended upon certain conditions.
params._proposalDateMinimumFuture: Duration in seconds to set the minimum future date for a proposal from the current time.
params._proposalPeriodDuration: Duration in seconds for how long the proposal period lasts.
params._proposalPeriodExtensionThreshold: Duration in seconds to set the threshold for extending the proposal period.
params.initialOwner: Address of the initial owner of the venue.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

resetBribe(bytes32,uint256).details: This function sets the bribe amount to zero directly in the storage.

params.proposalIndex: The index of the proposal within the show's list of proposals.
params.showId: The unique identifier of the show.

params._showContractAddress: The address of the Show contract.
params._showVaultAddress: The address of the ShowVault contract.
params._venueRegistryAddress: The address of the Venue Registry contract.

params.paymentToken: ERC20 token address for bribe payment (address(0) for ETH).
params.proposedDates: List of potential dates for the show.
params.showId: The unique identifier for the show.
params.venueId: The token ID of the venue, which references the venue's details.

params.proposalIndex: Index of the proposal to vote for.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

params.proposalIndex: Index of the proposal to vote for.

params.dateIndex: Index of the date to vote for.

dateVotes(bytes32,uint256).notice: Mapping to store the votes for specific dates for a venue.

getDateVotes(bytes32,uint256).notice: Retrieves the votes for specific dates for a show.

getHasDateVoted(bytes32,address).notice: Checks if an address has voted for a date for a show.

getHasTicketOwnerVoted(bytes32,address).notice: Checks if a ticket owner has voted for a venue.

getHasVoted(bytes32,address).notice: Checks if a specific address has voted for a venue proposal.

getPreviousDateVote(bytes32,address).notice: Retrieves the previous date vote of an address for a show.

getPreviousVote(bytes32,address).notice: Retrieves the previous vote of an address for a venue.

getProposal(bytes32,uint256).notice: Retrieves a specific proposal for a given show.

getProposalPeriod(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the proposal period for a specific venue.

getProposalsCount(bytes32).notice: Returns the number of proposals for a specific show.

getRefunds(address).notice: Retrieves the refunds owed to a proposer.

getSelectedDate(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the selected date for each show.

getSelectedProposalIndex(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the index of the selected proposal for each show.

getShowProposals(bytes32).notice: Retrieves all the proposals for a specific venue.

getVotingPeriods(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the voting period for a specific venue.

hasDateVoted(bytes32,address).notice: Mapping to check if an address has voted for a date for a venue.

hasTicketOwnerVoted(bytes32,address).notice: Mapping to track if a ticket owner has voted for a venue.

hasVoted(bytes32,address).notice: Mapping to track if a specific address has voted on a venue proposal.

initialize(address,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Initializes the Venue contract with Show and Ticket contract addresses and proposal period settings.

previousDateVote(bytes32,address).notice: Mapping to track the previous date votes of an address for a venue.

previousVote(bytes32,address).notice: Mapping to store the previous votes of an address for a venue.

proposalPeriod(bytes32).notice: Mapping of venue identifiers to their respective proposal periods.

refunds(address).notice: Mapping to track the refunds owed to proposers.

resetBribe(bytes32,uint256).notice: Resets the bribe amount to zero for a specified proposal of a show.

selectedDate(bytes32).notice: Mapping to store the selected date for each venue.

selectedProposalIndex(bytes32).notice: Mapping to store the index of the selected proposal for each venue.

setContractAddresses(address,address,add.notice: Sets the contract addresses for Show, ShowVault, and Venue Registry.

showProposals(bytes32,uint256).notice: Mapping of venue identifiers to lists of proposals.

submitProposal(bytes32,uint256,uint256[].notice: Submits a venue proposal for a specific show using the venue's token ID.

ticketHolderVenueVote(bytes32,uint256).notice: Allows a ticket holder to vote for a venue proposal during the proposal period, or switch their vote.

ticketHolderVotingActive(bytes32).notice: Flag to indicate if ticket holder voting is active for a venue.

ticketHolderVotingPeriods(bytes32).notice: Mapping to store the ticket holder voting periods for each show.

ticketOwnerVoteIndex(bytes32,address).notice: Mapping to track the proposal index that each ticket owner has voted for.

vote(bytes32,uint256).notice: Allows an authorized user (organizer or artist) to vote for a venue proposal.

voteForDate(bytes32,uint256).notice: Allows an authorized user (organizer or artist) to vote for a proposed date.

votingPeriods(bytes32).notice: Mapping of venue identifiers to their voting periods.
